FuncDef:
The mac-address-usage threshold command sets the usage threshold of a MAC address table.
The undo mac-address-usage threshold command deletes the set usage threshold of a MAC address table.
By default, the usage threshold of a MAC address table is 90%.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the usage threshold of a MAC address table.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 99.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To ensure stable running of the device that has a large number of MAC addresses configured, run the mac-address-usage threshold command to set the usage threshold of a MAC address table.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
